name: MazeRex
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/PKoLiUeBs82PykXn8

Rex was waiting for his day to be crowned as King. Until one day, he woke up from his sleep, only to realize that he was in a whole different world - a world surrounded by passages out of a huge endless maze! Still puzzled, not knowing what to do, Rex needs to get past the gates and get out of the maze. Rex needs your help! Discover the items and keys to help him get past the gates! He needs to find the way out of the endless maze and get back to his world. Only you can help him!
